EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response on case creation for CoreRecoveryInTeam@honeywell.com
EmailTemplate.name: Core Recovery Case Creation Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Core recovery in team {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
To communicate further with regards to this inquiry, please reply to this email.
We will respond to your request within one business day.
Honeywell Aerospace Core Recovery Team http://www.MyAerospace.com
